title: 65. Return to the Sauce - Infected Mushroom
text: If it's infected mushroom, I buy ðŸ˜ˆ It's infected. ðŸ˜ˆ by 7he 4udi0phi1e Buy it. Support artists who have talent; real, compositional and creatively original talent. These guys are miles beyond any other electronic act in terms of complexity, depth, and bombastically nasty beats. This Album reminds me of Vicious Delicious days. Beautiful progression and masterful precision in every track. Biography Formed: 1996 in Haifa, Israel Genre: Dance Years Active: '90s, '00s, '10s Mining Israel's Goa trance of its hottest intensities, Infected Mushroom remain one of the Middle East's biggest international cult successes. Erez Aizen's cheap background in obsessed bedroom computer tinkering had led him into and out of a number of crude dance efforts, and when a mutual friend suggested he should get together with Amit Duvdevani, a thrash metal fan who had just returned from an aborted career path in India, the two found enough in common to surreptitiously explore the rising psychedelic... Top Albums and Songs by Infected Mushroom 1.
